attributes.action: Ban all back garden fires during the pandemic.
attributes.additional_details:
Hot smoky air could be carrying the virus from people across the 2 meter distancing rule into peoples nearby houses.   
Quarantine rules demand we have the cleanest air possible in our houses.
attributes.background: UK still permits burning of garden rubbish and wood when composting and transporting to the local refuse facility is cleaner.    All fires or any kind should be banned while we have the pandemic.
